name: Baked Apple Turnovers
description: Oh so good! Better than store-bought, these can be prepared in advance and frozen. Simply freeze uncooked on a Sheet Pan; once frozen, place in freezer bags and bake when ready.

ingredients.name: apples
ingredients.additionalInstruction: peeled, cored, and cut into small pieces

ingredients.name: Baked Apple Sweet Dip Mix or Apple Pie Spice

preparation: Combine apple and spice in a Rectangular Steamer. Cover and microwave for 3 minutes on high. Let cool uncovered.
Roll 1 piece of pastry into a thin 10.5” square. Gently flip onto large side of an Appy Maker. Using a rolling pin, firmly roll over to cut pastry.
Add 1 tbsp of apple mixture to the centre of each triangle.
Take out second piece of puff pastry, roll, and layer on top. Using a rolling pin, gently but firmly roll over to seal pockets and cut pastry.
Gently remove each stuffed triangle from the Appy Maker and place on a Sheet Pan lined with a Sheet Pan Liner.
Brush with milk, if desired, and bake for 15 min or until golden brown. Cool on a wire rack and enjoy!
